device.description: Congrats! Your WalkingPad has been automatically discovered. Please give it a friendly name for Home Assistant.
device.title: Walkingpad

data_description.mac: The MAC address of your Walkingpad.

user.description: If your Walkingpad is ON, it should be automatically discovered by Home Assistant. Use manual configuration only if you know what you are doing.
user.title: Manual configuration of a Walkingpad
